item.title: 核心武器库
item.author: liu-huo@live.com (摸铁校尉🥉)
item.description: 稳定Tricks 1、模型融合 分类任务中软投票与硬投票. 2、对抗训练

item.title: 对抗训练:Fast Gradient Method详解
item.author: liu-huo@live.com (摸铁校尉🥉)
item.description: import torch class FGM(object): def __init__(self, model): self.model = model self.backup = {} def attack(self, epsilon=1., emb_name='emb'): # emb_name这个参数要换成你模型中embedding的参数名 for name, param in self.model.named_parameters(): if param.requires_grad and emb_name in name: self.backup[name] = param.data.clone() norm = torch.norm(param.grad) # 默认
